mapper.update: UPDATE samplefile SET samplefile_path=#{samplefilePath}, samplefile_name=#{samplefileName}, samplefile_ext=#{samplefileExt}, samplefile_type=#{samplefileType}, samplefile_size=#{samplefileSize}, samplefile_date=now()
mapper.select: SELECT samplefile_path as samplefilePath, samplefile_name as samplefileName, samplefile_ext as samplefileExt, ROUND(samplefile_size/1024, 1) as samplefileSize FROM samplefile WHERE sample_no=#{sampleNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO samplefile(sample_no, samplefile_path, samplefile_name, samplefile_ext, samplefile_type, samplefile_size, samplefile_date) VALUES (#{sampleNo},#{samplefilePath},#{samplefileName},#{samplefileExt},#{samplefileType},#{samplefileSize},NOW())
